DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the pharmacokinetics profiles of pregabalin sustained release tablet (300mg) to immediate release capsule(150mg * 2) while multiple dosing.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Compare The Pharmacokinetics of A Pregabalin Controlled Release Tablet 300mg and Immediate Release Formulation
